医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
点击式化学可快速开发 LNP 以增强 mRNA 递送想象一下这样一个场景：熟练的黑客必须上传关键软件来更新中央服务器，并阻止潜在致命的病毒在庞大的计算机网络中造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Click-like-chemistry-enables-rapid-development-of-LNPs-for-enhanced-mRNA-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Click-like-chemistry-enables-rapid-development-of-LNPs-for-enhanced-mRNA-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57eeefb1-3421-439c-bdd1-6102e2dfdcb1 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 08:02:57 -0400 Click-like chemistry enables rapid development of LNPs for enhanced mRNA delivery
安东尼·德·福格罗勒 (Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles) 被任命为以太坊新任主席领先的 mRNA 技术公司 etherna 今天宣布任命 Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles 为董事长。 Tony 自 2023 年 1 月起担任独立董事会成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antonin-(Tony)-de-Fougerolles-appointed-as-new-Chair-of-etherna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Antonin-(Tony)-de-Fougerolles-appointed-as-new-Chair-of-etherna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ba9af4-90bf-45c7-9265-25cf2c99e6c7 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Antonin (Tony) de Fougerolles appointed as new Chair of etherna
利用逆转录子衍生的多变子进行高效的多位点基因组编辑基因组编辑已成为一种广泛采用的修改细胞 DNA 的技术，使科学家能够在实验室中研究疾病并开发修复致病突变的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Efficient-multi-site-genome-editing-with-retron-衍生-multitrons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Efficient-multi-site-genome-editing-with-retron-衍生-multitrons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41b192d4-9672-46d9-9f98-4d7ef2893c31 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:45:04 -0400 Efficient multi-site genome editing with retron-derived multitrons
探索小型化 NGS 文库制备的好处在本次采访中，SPT Labtech 的现场应用科学家 Huw Rees 讨论了 NGS 文库制备中小型化的好处，以及使用蚊子®如何为您带来更多价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Exploring-the-benefits-of-miniaturizing-NGS-library-preparation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Exploring-the-benefits-of-miniaturizing-NGS-library-preparation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75048af5-bb94-472e-bb72-ae83cce02a6c Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:45:00 -0400 Exploring the benefits of miniaturizing NGS library preparation
为什么选举可能会减缓更换铅管的计划随着美国环境保护署即将推出旨在最大程度降低美国人饮用铅污染水风险的最新且最严格的计划，关于这些规定是否走得太远或还不够远的争论已经达到了临界点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Why-the-election-may-slow-plans-to-replace-lead-pipes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Why-the-election-may-slow-plans-to-replace-lead-pipes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c98614-634a-44f8-b829-ec5397117e78 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:29:02 -0400 Why the election may slow plans to replace lead pipes
了解酒精广告对体育赛事期间高风险饮酒者的影响埃迪斯科文大学 (ECU) 的新研究表明，在国家体育赛事转播期间接触酒精广告，尤其是那些以首选饮料为特色的广告，会显着增加有危险饮酒行为的人的渴望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Understanding-alcohol-advertising-effects-on-risky-drinkers-during-sports-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Understanding-alcohol-advertising-effects-on-risky-drinkers-during-sports-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5cfaaab-dbe8-4773-8f70-2c278095ff16 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 07:13:15 -0400 Understanding alcohol advertising effects on risky drinkers during sports events
专家确定了阿尔茨海默病认知抵抗力和恢复力方面的性别差异研究人员调查了阿尔茨海默病中与性别相关和性别特异性的抵抗力和恢复力因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Experts-identify-sex-and-gender-differences-in-cognitive-resistance-and-resilience-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Experts-identify-sex-and-gender-differences-in-cognitive-resistance-and-resilience-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2619e61c-cf66-4575-9ab3-4655c43bbba9 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 06:00:00 -0400 Experts identify sex and gender differences in cognitive resistance and resilience to Alzheimer's disease

科学家们发现了 5,000 多种基因变异，这些变异使某些癌症得以肆虐研究人员对 BAP1 进行了饱和基因组编辑，其功能障碍与癌症和神经发育受损有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Scientists-identify-over-5000-genic-variants-that-enable-certain-cancers-to-thrive.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Scientists-identify-over-5000-genic-variants-that-enable-certain-cancers-to-thrive.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f701adf-0595-44d4-a41e-2c7ea3ed53d9 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 05:31:00 -0400 Scientists identify over 5,000 genetic variants that enable certain cancers to thrive
